fields.System.Title: Verify that the tentative date is displayed for shipping the product
fields.Microsoft.VSTS.TCM.Steps: <steps id="0" last="5"><step id="1" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>Launch the application and login</P></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><P>Customer  should be able to login into the application with his credentials</P></parameterizedString><description/></step><step id="5" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>&nbsp;Click on the Categories which user is interested in </P></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>Products available under the category should be displayed&nbsp;</P></DIV></parameterizedString><description/></step><step id="2" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>Hover on the images of items under the selected category and click on Shop Now link</P></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>User should be able to navigate to Product Details screen</P></DIV></parameterizedString><description/></step><step id="3" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>Click on the "ADD TO CART" button on the Product description page</P></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>User should get navigated to Shopping Cart screen</P></DIV></parameterizedString><description/></step><step id="4" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>Enter the Valid pin code in the pin code field</P></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>Based on the pincode entered, tentative dates for shipping the product should be displayed.</P></DIV></parameterizedString><description/></step></steps>

fields.System.Title: Verify that user is able to remove the item from cart
fields.Microsoft.VSTS.TCM.Steps: <steps id="0" last="6"><step id="1" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>Launch the application and login into the application as a Customer</P></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><P>&nbsp;Customer  should be able to login into the application with his credentials</P></parameterizedString><description/></step><step id="2" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>Click on the Categories which user is interested in</P></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><P>Products available under the category should be displayed&nbsp;&nbsp;</P></parameterizedString><description/></step><step id="3" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>Hover on the images of items under the selected category and click on Shop Now button</P></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><P>User should be able to navigate to Product Details screen&nbsp;</P></parameterizedString><description/></step><step id="4" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>Click on the "ADD TO CART" button on the Product description page.</P></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>On adding item to cart, User should be able to see the added item in the Cart Page<BR/>Count on the cart icon should be displayed based on the number of items added to the cart.<BR/></P></DIV></parameterizedString><description/></step><step id="5" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>Click on the Cart icon on the home page.</P></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>User should get navigated to "Cart Page"</P></DIV></parameterizedString><description/></step><step id="6" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>Click on the Remove button on the cart page against the item which user wants to remove.</P></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>On removing the item, count on the cart icon should be decreased and the item should be removed from Cart page.</P></DIV></parameterizedString><description/></step></steps>

fields.System.Title: Verify that Admin is able to change the price of the item
fields.Microsoft.VSTS.TCM.Steps: <steps id="0" last="4"><step id="1" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>Launch the application and login as Admin<BR/></P></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><P>Admin should be able to login to the application with his credentials</P></parameterizedString><description/></step><step id="2" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>On navigating to Home screen, click on the Admin icon and select Manage items</P></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><P>Admin should be able to see the Manage Items icon in the Home screen&nbsp;</P></parameterizedString><description/></step><step id="3" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>On the Store manager page,  Click on the "Edit" link against the item which admin wants to update.</P></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><P>Admin should be able to edit the item link&nbsp;</P></parameterizedString><description/></step><step id="4" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>On item edit page, update the Price and Sale price and click on the Save button</P></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><P>On successful update, updated price should reflect on the Store manager screen against the respective item&nbsp;</P></parameterizedString><description/></step></steps>

fields.System.Title: Validate that customer is allowed to add an feedback to the item purchases
fields.Microsoft.VSTS.TCM.Steps: <steps id="0" last="10"><step id="2" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>Launch the application and login as an customer</P></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>&nbsp;User should be able to login to the site with his credentials</P></DIV></parameterizedString><description/></step><step id="3" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><P>Click on the Categories which user is interested in and hover on the image and click on Shop Now button</P></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><P>User should be able to hover, see the "Shop Now" image and click on it&nbsp;</P></parameterizedString><description/></step><step id="4" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P> Click on Add to Cart button  on the item page</P></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><P>Item should be added to cart&nbsp;</P></parameterizedString><description/></step><step id="5" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P> Click on Checkout button and enter Shipping information</P></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true">User should be able to enter details</parameterizedString><description/></step><step id="6" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P> Click on "Submit Order" button</P></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><P>User should be able to submit his order successfully&nbsp;</P></parameterizedString><description/></step><step id="7" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>Once order is placed, click on the Profile icon and select View order option</P></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><P>View Order option should be visible in the User Profile&nbsp;</P></parameterizedString><description/></step><step id="8" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P> Specify the search criteria, either by order number or by order dates</P></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><P>&nbsp;User should be able to see the orders or by dates or order</P></parameterizedString><description/></step><step id="9" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>Click on the Order number displayed in the search result</P></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><P>Order number should be able to get selected&nbsp;</P></parameterizedString><description/></step><step id="10" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>Click on the Feedback link and enter the review comments in the feedback form and click on Save button&nbsp;</P></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>Added feedback should get posted against the respective item&nbsp;</P></DIV></parameterizedString><description/></step></steps>

fields.Microsoft.VSTS.TCM.Steps: <steps id="0" last="6"><step id="1" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>Launch the application and login into the application as a customer</P></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>Customer  should be able to login into the application as an Customer.</P></DIV></parameterizedString><description/></step><step id="2" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>Search for the product by entering the product name on the search bar</P></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>Product based on the search results should be displayed.</P></DIV></parameterizedString><description/></step><step id="3" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><P>Select the product and add the product to Cart, From the cart screen, click on Proceed to Checkout button and make the payment</P></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>Order should be successfully placed and order number should be generated.</P></DIV></parameterizedString><description/></step><step id="4" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>Logout from the application and login as an admin</P></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>User should be able to login as admin</P></DIV></parameterizedString><description/></step><step id="5" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>Search for the product for which user had generated an order</P></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>Click on Edit description tab and change the product price and click on Save button</P></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><P>a. Updated product price should be saved<BR/>b. An email and an SMS notification on the price change should be sent out to the User who has ordered the product.</P></parameterizedString><description/></step></steps>

fields.System.Title: Verify search results change according to the input
fields.Microsoft.VSTS.TCM.Steps:
<steps id="0" last="2"><step id="1" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><TABLE border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="225" style="width: 169pt">
 <COLGROUP><COL width="225" style="width:169pt"/>
 </COLGROUP><TBODY><TR style="height:30.0pt">
  <TD height="40" class="xl65" width="225" style="height:30.0pt;width:169pt">
